name: Charitable trusts, special provision
text: Charitable trusts, special provisions.  (a)  Notwithstanding any other provisions, in the case of a charitable trust, the compensation of the trustees shall be limited to an amount that is reasonable under the circumstances. 	(b)  This section shall apply to existing and new charitable trusts established after January 1, 1999; provided that any provisions in existing trust agreements regarding trustees' compensation shall supersede this section. [L 1943, c 149, §§1, 2; RL 1945, §9758; RL 1955, §219-19; am L 1959, c 169, §2; HRS ; am L 1998, c 310, §2]
